channel.title: Materials on BMD-lab
channel.description: Recent content in Materials on BMD-lab

item.title: High-Throughput Identification of Electrides from All Known Inorganic Materials
item.description: Analyzing a database of more than 60 000 compounds, we identify 65 new electride candidates and recover 4 already known.

item.title: High-Throughput Identification of Electrides from All Known Inorganic Materials
item.description: Analyzing a database of density functional theory results on more than 60 000 compounds, we identify 65 new electride candidates and recover 4 already known.
